objects.name: NameRequirements
objects.string: Must contain alphanumeric and whitespace characters.

parameters: "[outline=black]Hello, [b]" + VariableString(ChosenName) + "[/b] and welcome to [b]Jurassic Park[/b] and [b]Isla Nublar[/b]![/outline]"
"[outline=black]My name is [b]Ellie Sattler[/b] and I will be your guide during your visit![/outline]"
